content.raw:
Dear my friends,
I test some objects, the problem is before saving the world, because i change the sdf file of my environment and modify pose tag of some objects and when i run it those apear in correct position and rotation, when we put a object in environment, discription of that object insert to sdf file and after that if we change that, the change is not insert to sdf file, so always sdf file have original position and rotation of objects. my mean is that SDF file is not updated after changing the world.
content.html: Dear my friends, I test some objects, the problem is before saving the world, because i change the sdf file of my environment and modify pose tag of some objects and when i run it those apear in correct position and rotation, when we put a object in environment, discription of that object insert to sdf file and after that if we change that, the change is not insert to sdf file, so always sdf file have original position and rotation of objects. my mean is that SDF file is not updated after changing the world.
